issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.81:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #2e2e2e.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.81:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #2e2e2e.
original_issue.selector: html > body > main > aside > div:nth-child(1) > h2

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.79:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #2e2e2e.

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 1:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #767676.

original_issue.selector: html > body > main > aside > div:nth-child(8) > p

issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

any.message: The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.77:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #5876ad, surrounding text: #333333)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

issues.title: Links rely on color to be distinguishable.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. Link text that is discernible improves the experience for users with low vision. [Learn how to make links distinguishable](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-in-text-block).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.77:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #5876ad, surrounding text: #333333)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text
